animeTitle: Gakuen Utopia Manabi Straight!: Natsu da! Manabi da! Kyouka Gasshuku da!
otherNames: Gakuen Utopia Manabi Straight! Episode 6.5, Gakuen Utopia Manabi Straight! OVA, がくえんゆーとぴあ まなびストレート！夏だ! まなびだ! 強化合宿だ!
synopsis: This episode takes place before the actual planning of the School Fair and shows how the girls spend their summer holidays.
